actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the first $5,000 of an individual's civil service retirement annuity shall be exempt from income tax.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income the first $5,000 received by an individual as a civil service or other Federal retirement annuity.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the first $5,000 of an individual's civil service retirement annuity shall be exempt from income tax.
